reviews.review_msg: Sirish is an exceptionally caring teacher, encouraging students to lean into their strengths and styles when writing stories, rather than conforming to typical academic expectations. The many field-trips and guest speakers made this class memorable. Would recommend his course to anyone, beginning or expert, interested in the art of storytelling.

If you skip class there's literally nothing for you to work off of. No textbooks, no canvas modules, maybe just knowlege that you have an assignment due, and a bit of info about it via email. Despite that Anosh is a pretty good teacher. He's really caring and will help you get the grade you want, he just expects you to put in the work!
